body.p: When developing the 2018 Conceptual Framework, the Board considered whether the Conceptual Framework will provide the Board with sufficient and appropriate tools to enable it, when developing Standards, to consider:

li.p: the business activity of long-term investment (see paragraphs BC0.37–BC0.39); and
the information needs of long-term investors (see paragraphs BC0.40–BC0.43).
